Reviews.Title: Don'g trouble yourself
Reviews.Author: JackIII
Reviews.Content: The product did not work as advertised, what more can I say. My experience with this vender was not worth my time.

Reviews.Title: Reasonable quality for a reasonable price.
Reviews.Author: James Ipock
Reviews.Content: I purchased this unit after seeing someone with the same model and thinking it was a pretty nice system.It's really a good system for the price. The only flaw I found in it had to do with the default VGA resolution. If you have an older monitor you will not get a picture at first. You will need to connect this unit to a higher quality monitor and then decrease the resolution to something lower.

ProductInfo.Features:
4 Channel H.264 Pentaplex Network DVR, 120FPS Realtime Display
Realtime Recording, 1280*1024 VGA Output, Support D1
Recording, 4 CH Playback, SATA HDD, Mobile Phone Surveillance
Compact Form Factor
ProductInfo.Name: LTS LTD7904 4 Channel H.264 Pentaplex Network D1 DVR
